title: Emerald and Diamond Kasu Mala - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Cubic Zirconia. Crafted with traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: This Kasu Mala features a delicate gold chain interspersed with small emerald and diamond embellishments in a heart design. The centerpiece is a stunning, intricately designed pendant featuring a large emerald surrounded by sparkling cubic zirconia. The pendant is finished with gracefully dangling golden beads, reminiscent of traditional temple jewelry.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or to add a touch of traditional elegance to modern celebrations.
description: This Kasu Mala effortlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The vibrant emeralds and sparkling diamonds create a captivating contrast against the rich yellow gold. The intricate craftsmanship and the use of high-quality materials ensure both beauty and durability. A treasured heirloom in the making.
